title: [project/wishlist] splitting embedded TH* libraries ?
body_html:
Torch7 (luajit) ships another copy of source of libTH* libraries.
Then which one is the "master" branch for the code of libTH* ? The original one shipped in torch7 or the one embedded in pytorch? How are they synchronized?

https://tracker.debian.org/pkg/lua-torch-torch7
https://tracker.debian.org/pkg/lua-torch-nn

As shown by the above links, libTH.so and libTHNN.so and their corresponding headers are already packaged for Debian/Experimental. Maybe pytorch can use some of the libraries provided by torch7?

body:
Torch7 (luajit) ships another copy of source of libTH* libraries.
Then which one is the "master" branch for the code of libTH* ? The original one shipped in torch7 or the one embedded in pytorch? How are they synchronized?

https://tracker.debian.org/pkg/lua-torch-torch7  
https://tracker.debian.org/pkg/lua-torch-nn  

As shown by the above links, libTH.so and libTHNN.so and their corresponding headers are already packaged for Debian/Experimental. Maybe pytorch can use some of the libraries provided by torch7?
